Reviews.Title: “In a trading estate!”

Reviews.Content: awful location city centre basicly italys industrial estate busy road clean tidy beds changed everyday breakfast consisted juice buns choice staff speak minimal english difficult getting knowlege city main getting centre buses packed sardines everytime city beautiful recommend rome stay closer city
